data.comment: The match is underway at Santiago Bernabeu.
Alvaro Negredo (Cadiz) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 2, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a throw-in for Cadiz, close to Real Madrid's area.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Santiago Bernabeu.
Cadiz's Anthony Lozano is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz surge into the attack at Santiago Bernabeu but Juan Cala’s header is off-target.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Isco (Real Madrid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Karim Benzema for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Santiago Bernabeu. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Real Madrid's Lucas Vazquez breaks free at Santiago Bernabeu. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 13, Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alvaro Negredo's header is off-target for Cadiz.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 14, Alex of Cadiz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Alvaro Negredo (Cadiz) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Goal! Cadiz have got their heads in front thanks to a Anthony Lozano strike.
Alvaro Negredo with an assist there.
In the minute 18, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 20, Lucas Vazquez for Real Madrid is whistled offside.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 22, Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid's Luka Modric gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cadiz defender.
In the minute 24, Real Madrid's Toni Kroos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 27, Santiago Jaime Latre awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Cadiz throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Cadiz's Anthony Lozano is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 29, Real Madrid’s Sergio Ramos is on his feet again at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 29, Sergio Ramos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Attention is being given to Cadiz’s Anthony Lozano and play has been suspended briefly.
Anthony Lozano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cadiz.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Throw-in Cadiz.
In Madrid Real Madrid attack through Toni Kroos. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Cadiz at Santiago Bernabeu.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Real Madrid's Sergio Ramos has been booked in Madrid.
Anthony Lozano for Cadiz is back on the field again.
In the minute 36, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Anthony Lozano.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
In the minute 38, Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Juan Cala's header is off-target for Cadiz.
Ball goes out of play for a Real Madrid goal kick.
In the minute 41, Real Madrid are coming forward and Vinicius Junior gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Real Madrid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Santiago Bernabeu the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Cadiz push upfield but Santiago Jaime Latre quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Eder Militao is replacing Sergio Ramos for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 46, Zinedine Zidane is making the team's third substitution at Santiago Bernabeu with Casemiro replacing Luka Modric.
Real Madrid make their fourth substitution with Federico Valverde replacing Isco.
Real Madrid are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Marco Asensio is replacing Lucas Vazquez for the home team.
In the minute 47, The away team have replaced Anthony Lozano with Filip Malbasic. This is the first substitution made today by Alvaro Cervera.
Throw-in Real Madrid.
In the minute 49, Vinicius Junior for Real Madrid gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 51, Real Madrid are caught offside.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
In the minute 54, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Jose Mari of Cadiz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 55, Santiago Jaime Latre signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
Real Madrid's Vinicius Junior gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 57, Cadiz attack but Alvaro Negredo's header doesn't find the target.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Real Madrid.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Can Real Madrid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Cadiz at Santiago Bernabeu.
Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Santiago Jaime Latre.
Santiago Jaime Latre signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In the minute 63, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Santiago Jaime Latre awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Real Madrid in their own half.
Can Cadiz get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 67, Cadiz's Juan Cala misses with an attempt on goal.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Real Madrid's Vinicius Junior attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Santiago Bernabeu.
Throw-in Cadiz.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Real Madrid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcelo for Real Madrid who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jose Mari is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Cadiz's Jose Mari looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 75, Marcelo has recovered and rejoins the match in Madrid.
Free kick Real Madrid.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
In the minute 76, The away team has substituted Jose Mari with Garrido. Alvaro Cervera is thus making his second change.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Real Madrid make their fifth substitution with Luka Jovic replacing Toni Kroos.
